It's a fun game that includes real life physics. Its graphics are good but the gameplay is better. One of the greatest puzzle games of all time for me. Get this game if you don't have it, or purchase the Orange Box if you like HL2, TF2, and Portal.

Portal is a short, fun game. You are a rat lab on the aperture science laboratories, and must help the facility's computer run a series of test on you. As the game progresses, you get the portal gun, a device that allows you to create sort of "teleporting" screen between two distinct surfaces, allowing the player to enter one of them, to exit in the other. A very creative and fun game, with a twist ending.
Отличное начало грандиозной игры!
good game, but portal 2 is better :3

Any negative reviews are just slices of cake.  This game is every bit innovative as you've heard and then some.  Clever puzzles and remarkable writing set this game apart from the crowd.  If you haven't played it, you're missing out on some good times.
I really like the game, but I couldn’t find the stupid cake.  3/10
Aのポータルを作り、Bのポータルを作る。すると、AとBのポータルが繋がる。この特性を活かし、向こう岸の壁にAのポータルを作り、こちら側の岸にBのポータルを作り、そのBのポータルに入れば・・・、向こう岸のAのポータルに出る事が出来る。このポータルを応用し、さまざまなパズル部屋を突破しよう！斬新なアイデアによるパズルアクションゲーム！

Not as awesome or as long as Portal 2, however, it will suffice.

Yeah, Awesome.

自由自在に移動できるポータルを用いたこのパズルは
定められた解法があり、その解法がわかると満足感・達成感が味わえる。
定められた解法は一つだけではなく、ポータルを駆使することで
手順を飛ばして解法を導き出すことが可能。
また、このゲームを飾るアイテムとして、タレットやキューブなどユニークなものもあり
飽きさせない作りになっている。ただし、上記アイテムが登場すると解法への
道がファジーになり、ゴリ押しが可能になるのが残念なところ。
クリア後には、難易度を上げたゲーム中のステージや、ポータル使用回数・
歩数などの最短を目指すボーナスゲームもあり、クリア後も楽しめる作りになっている。
everyone got this thing for free

This game seems to me to be somewhat of a classic Steam game, and it definitely deserves the recognition it gets. I love the theme throughout, and it manages to go from being funny and quirky to actually quite creepy, while all the while presenting you with unique and challenging puzzles, all of which I found very rewarding.
Good game.
Awesome game. I highly recommend it to anyone who likes puzzle games.
Jogo totalmente inovador e divertido!!! Mas uma grande obra de Valve!!!

Probably one of my all time favorite single player games.

Just, fantastic!!

This game has an amazing combination of puzzles, logical thinking, and comedy. Although short, this game really encourages the player to think about their next move and the effect it may have. Regardless of choice though, the ominous GLaDOS is always there to humorously critisise your decision. If you like to solve puzzles in a fun and unique way, I highly reccomend this game.
iyooha 인증 2007년 최고의 게임. 강추합니다.
Oozes atmosphere. It's a very short game but it's the best tech demo of all time.
The cake is a lie!!!

Do you like puzzle games? You do now. Portal is one of the most imaginative games ever to be created. Based on the cult classic Narbacular Drop (did you think Portal invented portals?), this is something everyone should play at least once. Not only that but it feature - careful not to fall in love - GlaDOS and tons, I said tons of stupid catchphrases and other stuff that ended up turning into internet memes. Warning: Portal jokes are really old by now.

Insert cake joke here.

Left me wanting more puzzles. Then there were more puzzles in challenge mode.

I like puzzles.
классная игра,но короткая.

The precursor to something legendary, and a groundbreaking game in the world of sociology because of how the two main characters were portrayed. A must-play for sure, and although it's not very long it is so cheap now it's worth the look. Sarcastic, witty, and just hard enough to be challenging without frustrating, especially in the later levels.

speedy thing go in - speedy thing go out!
amazing game
Valve confeziona un titolo geniale, ottimo su tutti i punti di vista.. peccato non duri di più!

What's to be said?  Short and sweet.  As I understand, this game was slapped together quickly by Valve as an apology to gamers for letting them down on something else.

Best. Apology. Ever.
Did you know you can donate one or all of your vital organs to the Aperture Science self esteem fund for girls? It's true!
Awesome game, must play before portal 2.
The only reason you''re reading this is to stall for time before buying Portal. Or to entertain yourself while downloading Portal. There is no earthly reason why you should not own Portal.

One of the shortest, yet most satisfying, puzzle games that I have ever played. Everything about this game and its content is fresh and exciting.
Not too shabby if you're in it for the pure game. Nice and cheap, anyway :P
A fantasticly innovative 1st person puzzle game. It's also meme-tastic!
I suggest this game because if you want to begin this series you should buy Portal to start with the basics.

amazing game with a very exciting story and gameplay. it makes you think in many different ways that you normally wouldn't think about and you need to really think about the problem from several different angles if you are going to make it trough the game. 8/10

Such a classic game. Simple, yet amazing in just about every way. Be sure to check out the developer commentary after you beat it for the first time.
A FPS but u dont really wield a killing weapon hoho. Need more sequels of this pls!
Одна из интереснейших реализаций объемных головоломок. Приправлена замечательными шутками и музыкальным сопровождением. Обязательна к прохождению.
Incredibly short game, but a definite game-changer nonetheless. One of the most interesting games I have ever played.

Es un juego bastante entretenido, los puzles de la campaña son fáciles pero los avanzados ya te hacen quemar mas neuronas. La campaña principal apenas dura unas 2 hrs. La trama es muy minimalista, pero complementa muy bien la experiencia.

En general, esta muy recomendado para las personas que, como yo, están algo aburridas de montones de shooters sin sentido, y cuya premisa no va mas allá de matar alemanes (si, como los Call of Duty anuales). Cambiar de aires y disfrutar de una experiencia distinta de vez en cuando es muy agradable.

Lo mejor de todo: este solo es el título experimental, pues abre las puertas a una excelente secuela. Sí, me refiero a Portal 2.
This is with portal 2 the most fun puzzle serie of games i ever played. You should really buy it! it's very awesome and definetly worth!

Stimmige Story, schwieriege Rätsel und ein Humor, der eine des öfteren zum schmunzeln bringt. Alles in Allem eine gut abgerundete Puzzel-Action, die mit Sicherheit jeden für längere Zeit an den PC fesselt.

If you havn't played this, like I hadn't yesterday morning, just do it. You won't regret it!
It is fairly short but oh so sweet!
A fun little indie game from days past.

A must-play.

Simply one of the best games ever.

一人称視点のパズルゲーム。不思議な世界観とワープを用いたアクションパズルは
とても斬新な作品。
自分は、あぁなるほど！とこのゲームの魅力とある程度の操作に慣れたのが９面から
でした。
全部でストーリーは１９面（クリア後に上級者MAPが数個出現するのでちょっと多くなる）ですが、ちょっとボリューム不足ですが、海外で絶賛された、Portal2をやる前に是非おすすめしたい作品。

日本語の字幕も標準搭載されてます。

Portal 1 is a cheeky little number that still deserves checking out. Occasionally I will boot it up just to try and beat some of the achievements that remain unearned... but then I remember why they remain unearned. Portal 1 has some very tough puzzles, tougher than most found in Portal 2. The final battle with GlaDOS is great from at the very least a character development point of view. You should definitely check this out if you have any interest in the world of Portal... it's still a great game that you can knock over in a few hours.

But seriously - did you not buy the Orange Box? What?
Tres bon jeux, un peu court mais tres prenant, si vous souhaitez acheter le 2 je vous conseil vivement le 1 egalement pour comprendre l'histoire et certain clin d'oeil dans le 2
If you have not allready played this yet, play it.
I know the cake is a lie, but I really like cake......
Simplesmente fenomenal
Spiel Portal > bekomm Kuchen!

One of the most successful and creative games of the past decade.  Clean, simple science (I mean, fun) that takes a little ingenuity.  Dialogue with GLaDOS is probably one of the best parts of the game.  (Buy Portal 2 as well)

E' un gioco molto originale e stimolante. Sarebbe stato bello se avessero introdotto alcune meccaniche di Portal anche in Half life 2. Il gioco ha una longevità di 3/4 ore (ho impiegato 6 ore perchè ho rigiocato una quindicina di livelli e le mappe bonus). Questo gioco mi ha incuriosito e penso che comprerò anche il seguito. 

Voto: 8

Es un tipo de juego diferente...tienes que echar mano al coco si quieres pasar las pruebas. Como siempre, el motor Source hace gala de su calidad en cada juego de Valve. El único inconveniente que le veo es que el juego te lo pasas en 3 días...

[b]7/10[/b]

Still nothing like it. You use your Portal gun to overcome physical puzzles. The gun fires two different portals: a blue one and an orange one. Walk into one of the portals, and you come out the other. That's the whole game.

Very fun, very addictive. Funny story.

I feel like I didn't review this enough, but it's Portal. If you haven't played Portal, don't read a review; just go play it.

B+. I know a lot of people really love Portal, and it really is a good game. But it's definitely not as great as it's made out to be. It is excellent in every technical aspect. It is entirely well-built. But for me it's just not engaging enough to get an A.

Witty, fast-paced, and fun. It might be a little short, but what it lacks in quantity it makes up for in never being boring, from beginning to end. Buy it, play it, laugh at it, then go get Portal 2, its worthy successor.
Recommended for everyone, even people that hate games... - why? It's not a shooter. It's a first-person puzzle game that's really addicting and replayable!
You can't miss this one!!
